title: Evolution Uncertainty Communicator
reason: We need this skill because agents stagnate without structured reflection and continuous improvement loops. This specific skill prevents overstatement by explicitly framing uncertainty.
implementationGuide: Define the scope and success metrics for `Evolution Uncertainty Communicator`, including at least three measurable KPIs tied to capability stagnation and repeated blind spots.
Design and version the input/output contract for outcomes, error taxonomies, and adaptation decisions, then add schema validation and failure-mode handling.
Implement the core capability using confidence-bound communication templates, and produce uncertainty briefs with deterministic scoring.
Integrate the skill into swarm orchestration: task routing, approval gates, retry strategy, and rollback controls.
Add unit, integration, and simulation tests that explicitly cover capability stagnation and repeated blind spots, then run regression baselines.
Deploy behind a feature flag, monitor telemetry/alerts for two release cycles, and iterate thresholds based on observed outcomes.

validationGates.check: All required input signals present and schema-valid
Repeated run on same inputs yields stable scoring and artifacts
Approval gates satisfied before publish-level outputs

knownFailures.action: Reject payload, emit validation error, request corrected payload
Freeze output, escalate to human approval router
Apply retry policy then rollback to last stable baseline

handoffContract.downstreamHint: Route next to autonomous-learning-and-evolution:communication-engine consumers with approval-gate context
